name: Site Name - Main Menu ➜ About and About Modal show custom name

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
1. System Console ➜ Site Configuration ➜ Customization
  2. Type "-test" at the end of what is in the box
  3. Save
inline.expectedResult:
Name as typed in the box should appear in:
  • Log-in page
  • Main Menu ➜ About
  • Main Menu ➜ About ➜ About Modal

Note: check this on desktop app, browser and RN apps

customFields.Related ticket(s): Change "about" section references to use the site name when it is configured — MM-12320
